item.description:
ARTIST'S WAY WILL NEXT MEET on JANUARY 7TH

**Please note that we are STILL MEETING AT 7pm **

We are now in our tenth week and reading Chapters 9 and 10 of the Artist's Way or Walking in This World. Please come prepared to discuss the chapter and keep up your morning pages and Artist Dates this week!!

If you are able, please bring a $5 donation to the Gallery for the use of their space -- thank you!!
item.how_to_find_us: I will greet you at the door
item.name: Artists Way Cambridge Meetup
